name: Pit of the Slime King
description:
Seems like you have fallen into a pit full of hungry slimes o_o
Luckly you have your magic staff with you :) How convenient uh?!
Defeat the slime waves and watch out for the Slime King, for he is not gonna be happy to know you're beating up his kids! (I know I wouldn't...)

This game was made in something between 48h and 72h for Ludum Dare 37.

Obs.: Had some issues with surfaces and shaders in html5 so the pause state is a little bit weird. Windows version is cooler =]
